nodes.text: An individual served as the personal pilot of Chalmun, the Wookiee proprietor of Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina in Mos Eisley, Tatooine. He or she was present at the cantina when local farmer Luke Skywalker and Jedi Master-in-exile Obi-Wan Kenobi arrived looking for a pilot to bring them to the planet Alderaan in the year 0 BBY.
